Get started!

API Documentation

The core of OpenCPU is the REST API for reading, executing and publishing data and code.

OpenCPU Apps

OpenCPU has a simple system for turning an R package into a deployable web application.

Scientific computing in the cloud.

For everyone, anywhere.

  • Follow @OpenCPU
  • Tweet

Embedded Analytics

OpenCPU is a framework for scalable, embedded scientific computing, based on R and Latex. It makes innovations in statistics, vizualization and data-science easy to integrate and more widely applicable.

Public cloud computing

OpenCPU provices a free and open platform for statistical computing in the cloud. For Students and Professors, Researchers and Professionals, Science, Business, Medical or any other field.

Collaborative Research

OpenCPU facilitates sharing of code, data and results, from anywhere and with anyone, without the need for commercial software packages. This way you can contribute to transparent, reproducible research.


The REST API

The core of OpenCPU is a HTTP REST API that facilitates interaction with the computational back-end. Any system or programming language that has the capability to connect to the internet can interact with OpenCPU.

The R language

OpenCPU supports the popular open source programming language R from the R-project. Functionality that is available in R can be called from OpenCPU. Call or publish functions, store or retrieve object and images and generate reproducible reports.

The Community

OpenCPU is meant to be the basis of social data analysis infrastructure. It uses open source software that is used and supported academics, professionals and volunteers. Join a community that encourages you to think, invent, share, and keep learning, every day.


Back to top

OpenCPU is an initiative from Jeroen Ooms and has been implemented by Stat/Dev consulting in The Netherlands.

The implementation has been supported by a Research and Development grant (WBSO) from the Dutch government.

This website was created using Twitter Bootstrap.
